verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> the Lord!<WH3050> Praise<WH1984> the Lord,<WH3068> O my soul!<WH5315>
I will praise<WH1984> the Lord<WH3068> while I live;<WH9132> I will sing<WH2167> praises<WH2167> to my God<WH430> while<WH5750> I have my being.
Do not trust<WH982> in princes,<WH5081> In mortal<WH1121> man,<WH120> in whom<WH7945> there<WH369> is no<WH369> salvation.<WH8668>
His spirit<WH7307> departs,<WH3318> he returns<WH7725> to the earth;<WH127> In that very day<WH3117> his thoughts<WH6250> perish.
How blessed<WH835> is he whose<WH7945> help<WH5828> is the God<WH410> of Jacob,<WH3290> Whose hope<WH7664> is in the Lord<WH3068> his God;<WH430>
Who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth,<WH776> The sea<WH3220> and all<WH3605> that is in them; Who keeps<WH8104> faith<WH571> forever;<WH5769>
Who executes<WH6213> justice<WH4941> for the oppressed;<WH6231> Who gives<WH5414> food<WH3899> to the hungry.<WH7457> The Lord<WH3068> sets<WH5425> the prisoners<WH631> free.<WH6605>
The Lord<WH3068> opens<WH6491> [the eyes of] the blind;<WH5787> The Lord<WH3068> raises<WH2210> up those who are bowed<WH3721> down;<WH3721> The Lord<WH3068> loves<WH157> the righteous;<WH6662>
The Lord<WH3068> protects<WH8104> the strangers;<WH1616> He supports<WH9388> the fatherless<WH3490> and the widow;<WH490> But He thwarts<WH5791> the way<WH1870> of the wicked.<WH7563>
The Lord<WH3068> will reign<WH4427> forever,<WH5769> Thy God,<WH430> O Zion,<WH6726> to all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755> Praise<WH1984> the Lord!<WH3050>
